```{r setup, include=FALSE}

```
Let us read the dataset and visualize it.
```{r}
dataset1 <- opt
class(dataset1)
dataset1 %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  tbl_summary(include = c(Age, Black, White, "V5..S7"))
